PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ElementAssemblyTypeTractionSwitchingAssembly
PropertySetDef.Definition: Energy switching assembly properties used in railway. The property set can be used by the predefined type TRACTION_SWITCHING_ASSEMBLY of IfcElementAssembly.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalCurrent
PropertyDef.Definition: A set of nominal currents in [A] for which the data of this instance is valid. At least one value shall be provided. Any value in the set shall not exceed the value of the UltimateRatedCurrent associated with the same breaker unit.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 定格電流[A]を少なくても1つ値をセットしなければならない。 セット内の任意の値の値を超えてはならない。 定格電流は、同じブレーカ部に関連付けられている。
정격 전류 [A]를 적어도 1 개의 값을 설정해야한다. 동일한 차단기부와 연결된 정격전류는세트 내의 임의의 값은 초과할 수 없다.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalPower
PropertyDef.Definition: A conventional value of apparent power determining a value of the rated current that may be carried with rated voltage applied, under specified conditions. ( IEV ref 421-04-04)

PropertyDef.Name: RatedVoltage
PropertyDef.Definition: The range of allowed voltage that a device is certified to handle. The upper bound of this value is the maximum.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 使用できることが許可されている許容電圧。

PropertyDef.Name: DesignAmbientTemperature
PropertyDef.Definition: The highest and lowest local ambient temperature likely to be encountered.
